full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 195 of 262 1906
LC8VMAX6 Rodgers - cross
actors and other types of artists, right?
A. Correct.
Q. And those people, those artists, are in high school for this camp, right?
A. Yes.
Q. Okay. And it's pretty well known in the arts community, the Interlochen Arts Camp; isn't that right?
A. Correct.
Q. Now, you testified, I believe, that from 1991, when you first started working for Mr. Epstein, to 1998, you flew to Interlochen once a year roughly, right?
A. Yes.
Q. And you did that typically in the month of August, right?
A. Yes.
Q. I think you mentioned there may have been one year where you went July 31st, right at the end of July; but other than that, it was August, right?
A. Correct.
Q. And Mr. Epstein, I think you're aware that he had a cabin at Interlochen, right?
A. Yes. I believe it was referred to as a lodge.
Q. A lodge?
A. Yes.
Q. But he had the ability to stay in that lodge if he wanted to, right?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00013473
